description:
Yuuta has been kidnapped in order to lure Ogi into a trap.  Soumei tangles with Ogi and succeeds in taking over his body. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sasaki Yuuta Kidnapping Case / Inaba Family Breakdown Case (Part One)
Sasaki Yuuta Yuukai Jiken / Inaba Oyako Ketsuretsu Jiken (Zenpen)
佐々木優太誘拐事件 / 因幡親子決裂事件(前編)
